resources.string:
• No detection duration limit
• No scenario, events, conditions and actions creation count limitations
• Export/Import scenarios as zip files
• Communicate with other application via Intents
• Enable/Disable an event and change its state during the scenario execution
• Control the detection threshold for each condition
• Automatically stop the detection when certain end conditions are met
• Randomize your scenario values to avoid detection by other applications
• Tune the detection algorithm to improve its speed or its correctness
Thank you for buying\nSmart AutoClicker Pro !
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to create more than %1$d actions
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to send intents
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to change events enabled state
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to save a scenario as a zip file
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to import a scenario from a zip file
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to create more than %1$d conditions
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to change the condition tolerated difference
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to run detection sessions that last more than %1$d minutes
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to create more than %1$d events
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to change the state of an event
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to enable the anti detection by third party apps
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to create more than %1$d scenarios
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to change the detection quality of the algorithm
Buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to create auto end detection conditions
